original_title: Robert Townsend: Partners in Crime: Vol. 2
overview: Director Robert Townsend (Hollywood Shuffle) knows how to construct and, when necessary, even milk a laugh for optimal effect. This second riotous volume in the Partners in Crime collection features more ribald moments culled from Townsend's laugh-filled HBO variety show. Sinbad, David Allen Grier and Damon Wayans also star.
title: Robert Townsend: Partners in Crime: Vol. 2
